20#include <config.h>
21
22/* Specification. */
23#undef ENABLE_RELOCATABLE /* avoid defining set_program_name as a macro */
24#include "progname.h"
25
26#include <string.h>
27
28
29/* String containing name the program is called with.
30 To be initialized by main(). */
31const char *program_name = NULL;
32
33/* Set program_name, based on argv[0]. */
34void
35set_program_name (const char *argv0)
36{
37 /* libtool creates a temporary executable whose name is sometimes prefixed
38 with "lt-" (depends on the platform). It also makes argv[0] absolute.
39 Remove this "<dirname>/.libs/" or "<dirname>/.libs/lt-" prefix here. */
40 const char *slash;
41 const char *base;
42
43 slash = strrchr (argv0, '/');
44 base = (slash != NULL ? slash + 1 : argv0);
45 if (base - argv0 >= 7 && memcmp (base - 7, "/.libs/", 7) == 0)
46 argv0 = base;
47 if (strncmp (base, "lt-", 3) == 0)
48 argv0 = base + 3;
49 program_name = argv0;
50}
51
